statements: SELECT * FROM warranty_info;
SELECT component_id, component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date, warranty_provider FROM warranty_info;
SELECT component_id, component_name FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_provider = 'Company A';
SELECT * FROM warranty_info ORDER BY warranty_start_date DESC;
SELECT component_id, component_name, warranty_provider FROM warranty_info ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_provider = 'ABC Warranty Services';
SELECT * FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT component_name, warranty_start_date, warranty_end_date FROM warranty_info WHERE component_id = 'dc3b972c-1213-4767-ba00-1dda11122e7d';
SELECT * FROM warranty_info WHERE warranty_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND warranty_provider LIKE '%Warranty%';
SELECT warranty_provider, COUNT(*) AS warranty_count FROM warranty_info GROUP BY warranty_provider HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY warranty_count DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT component_name, warranty_length, start_date FROM warranty_information WHERE component_id = 1;
SELECT manufacturer, model_name FROM vehicle_model WHERE year_of_manufacture > 2010;
SELECT component_id, component_name, start_date FROM warranty_information ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT model_name, year_of_manufacture FROM vehicle_model WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE component_id = 100
SELECT component_name, warranty_length FROM warranty_information WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT manufacturer, model_name FROM vehicle_model ORDER BY year_of_manufacture DESC
SELECT component_name, warranty_length FROM warranty_information WHERE component_id = 200 ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_length > INTERVAL '3 years'
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT component_name, warranty_duration FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration > 2;
SELECT warranty_provider, component_name FROM warranty_information WHERE component_id = 3;
SELECT component_id, warranty_duration, warranty_provider FROM warranty_information ORDER BY warranty_duration DESC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_models FROM vehicle_models GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration > 2 ORDER BY component_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT component_name, warranty_provider FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration < 5 AND warranty_provider LIKE '%Company%' ORDER BY component_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_provider = 'Brand X' AND warranty_duration > 1 ORDER BY warranty_duration ASC, component_name DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT vehicle_models.model_name, vehicle_models.manufacturer, component_id, warranty_duration FROM warranty_information JOIN vehicle_models ON warranty_information.component_id = vehicle_models.model_id WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY model_name DESC, manufacturer ASC;
SELECT component_id, COUNT(history_id) AS num_records FROM component_history GROUP BY component_id HAVING num_records > 10 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM electric_vehicle_components;
SELECT component_name, warranty_type, warranty_start_date FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE warranty_end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_models WHERE manufacturer = 'Tesla';
SELECT model_name, year FROM vehicle_models ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM warranty_providers WHERE provider_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_models WHERE year > 2018;
SELECT model_name, manufacturer FROM vehicle_models ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT component_name, warranty_type FROM electric_vehicle_components WHERE warranty_type = 'Extended';
SELECT provider_name, contact_email FROM warranty_providers WHERE provider_id < 3;
SELECT c.component_name, w.claim_date FROM electric_vehicle_components c JOIN warranty_claims w ON c.component_id = w.component_id;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT component_id, warranty_duration, component_name FROM warranty_information;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_model, manufacturer FROM vehicle;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM warranty_provider;
SELECT component_id, quantity FROM component_inventory;
SELECT * FROM warranty_information;
SELECT vehicle_model, manufacturer, vehicle_id FROM vehicle ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT component_name, warranty_duration FROM warranty_information WHERE warranty_duration > 2;
SELECT provider_name, provider_location FROM warranty_provider WHERE provider_location = 'USA';
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, status FROM warranty_claim WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
